creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: predominantly red, brown, and yellow huipil with multicolored embroidery; huipil's colors in the form of vertical stripes; embroidered decorations include animal motifs; neck opening is circular with vertical slit in front; sleeves consist of slits cut at sides; neck opening has border of a blue floral fabric with tassels made from fabric; constructed of two panels
title: Ceremonial huipil
